sentences: Puuduvad andmed tema edasise saatuse kohta.
JÃ¤rve kohta on teab rahvas mitmeid muistendeid.
Iga laua kohta on kaks tooli.
context: The Estonian word 'kohta' is a postposition with multiple related meanings. It can indicate the object or subject of discussion (about), show distribution or ratio (per, for), or refer to time periods (throughout). In its different forms, it functions as partitive singular and illative singular of the noun 'koht'. Its usage varies from indicating what something relates to, showing calculations per unit, expressing relationships between people/things, and describing time frames.
